summary: An ordinance relating to the Municipal Sewerage Utility, authorizing the construction and installation of a sewer in West Lee Street and certain alleys and easements as part of the additions, betterments and extensions to said utility contemplated by plan and system Ordinance No. 84391, making an appropriation from the Sewer Fund as an advance to capital account therefor, repealing Ordinance No. 85125, and ratifying and confirming acts and expenditures heretofore performed and made.
